index.subtitle: Ruby
index.about: Ruby is a dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity. It has an elegant syntax that is natural to read and easy to write.

videos.title: Ruby Version Managers
videos.description: Techniques for installing Ruby and managing different versions between applications.

videos.title: Rails Application Structure
videos.description: A look into the files and folders inside every Rails application and how they fit together.

videos.title: User Authentication with Devise
videos.description: A look into user accounts, registration, login, forgot your password, and more.

videos.title: File Uploading with Carrierwave
videos.description: Using Rails to upload files manually and how you can do it even cleaner using Carrierwave.

videos.title: Pagination with will_paginate
videos.description: A look into how pagination works from scratch and how to use will_paginate.

videos.title: Pretty urls with FriendlyID
videos.description: Techniques for taking your database models and using attributes to generate pretty urls.

videos.title: The Params Hash
videos.description: A glimpse into the 'magic' behind the params hash and the various ways it gets populated.
